20110116160623.000|20110116160625.000|CC1|MUSICAL JOURNEY BEGAN IN        
20110116160625.000|20110116160628.000|CC1|NASHVILLE, TENNESSEE.           
20110116160628.000|20110116160629.000|CC1|GREGORY ALLMAN WAS BORN ON      
20110116160629.000|20110116160632.000|CC1|DECEMBER 8, 1947, A YEAR AND    
20110116160632.000|20110116160636.000|CC1|18 DAYS AFTER HIS BROTHER       
20110116160636.000|20110116160636.000|CC1|DUANE.                          
20110116160636.000|20110116160638.000|CC1|TRAGEDY STRUCK EARLY.           
20110116160638.000|20110116160640.000|CC1|THEIR FATHER WAS MURDERED BY A  
20110116160640.000|20110116160642.000|CC1|HITCHHIKER WHEN GREG WAS JUST   
20110116160642.000|20110116160642.000|CC1|TWO.                            
20110116160642.000|20110116160644.000|CC1|BIG BROTHER DUANE HAD TO FILL   
20110116160644.000|20110116160646.000|CC1|THE VOID.                       
20110116160646.000|20110116160648.000|CC1|SO HE WAS KIND OF A FATHER      
20110116160648.000|20110116160649.000|CC1|FIGURE TO YOU IN SOME WAYS.     
20110116160649.000|20110116160651.000|CC1|>> ALSO BIG BROTHER.            
20110116160651.000|20110116160653.000|CC1|HE KNEW SO MUCH MORE THAN ME.   
20110116160653.000|20110116160656.000|CC1|IF WE DIDN'T LIVE TO BE 96 AND  
20110116160656.000|20110116160700.000|CC1|95, I'D BE BABY BROTHER STILL.  
20110116160700.000|20110116160701.000|CC1|>> Reporter: BUT IT WAS GREG    
20110116160701.000|20110116160703.000|CC1|WHO FIRST DISCOVERED MUSIC      
20110116160703.000|20110116160706.000|CC1|WHEN ASININE-YEAR-OLD HE SAW A  
20110116160706.000|20110116160709.000|CC1|NEIGHBOR WITH A GUITAR.         
20110116160709.000|20110116160711.000|CC1|WHAT YOU GOT HERE, JIMMY?       
20110116160711.000|20110116160717.000|CC1|HE SAID, IT'S A GUITAR, BOY.    
20110116160717.000|20110116160719.000|CC1|AND HE PLAYED SHE'LL BE COMING  
20110116160719.000|20110116160720.000|CC1|AROUND THE MOUNTAIN.            
20110116160720.000|20110116160721.000|CC1|>> Reporter: DID YOU FALL IN    
20110116160721.000|20110116160722.000|CC1|LOVE WITH THE GUITAR THE FIRST  
20110116160722.000|20110116160723.000|CC1|TIME YOU SAW IT?                
20110116160723.000|20110116160724.000|CC1|>> I DID.                       
20110116160724.000|20110116160728.000|CC1|IT WAS LIKE THAT.               
20110116160728.000|20110116160729.000|CC1|>> Reporter: GREG THOUGHT       
20110116160729.000|20110116160731.000|CC1|DUANE WHO QUICKLY BECAME A      
20110116160731.000|20110116160736.000|CC1|VIRTUOSO.                       
20110116160736.000|20110116160739.000|CC1|THEY PLAYED TOGETHER UNTIL      
20110116160739.000|20110116160740.000|CC1|1969 WHEN DUANE ASSEMBLED WHAT  
20110116160740.000|20110116160742.000|CC1|WOULD BECOME THE ALLMAN         
20110116160742.000|20110116160743.000|CC1|BROTHERS BAND.                  
20110116160743.000|20110116160746.000|CC1|GREG WAS RELUCTANT TO SIGN ON.  
20110116160746.000|20110116160748.000|CC1|>> I WAS ACCEPTED TO COLLEGE    
20110116160748.000|20110116160749.000|CC1|TO BE A GENERAL SURGEON.        
20110116160749.000|20110116160750.000|CC1|>> Reporter: NO WAY.            
20110116160750.000|20110116160752.000|CC1|>> REALLY.                      
20110116160752.000|20110116160753.000|CC1|MY BROTHER SAID, MAN, WE HAVE   
20110116160753.000|20110116160755.000|CC1|TO GO OUT AND TEAR UP THE       
20110116160755.000|20110116160756.000|CC1|ROADS FOR A WHILE.              
20110116160756.000|20110116160757.000|CC1|I SAID I'LL TELL YOU WHAT.      
20110116160757.000|20110116160758.000|CC1|I'LL GO OUT THERE FOR TWO       
20110116160758.000|20110116160759.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20110116160759.000|20110116160800.000|CC1|THEN I'M GOING BACK TO MED      
20110116160800.000|20110116160801.000|CC1|SCHOOL.                         
20110116160801.000|20110116160802.000|CC1|I GOT OUT THERE.                
20110116160802.000|20110116160804.000|CC1|IN TWO YEARS I WAS SO FAR IN    
20110116160804.000|20110116160808.000|CC1|DEBT, MAN, I HAD TO STAY.       
20110116160808.000|20110116160810.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IN DEBT PERHAPS.   
20110116160810.000|20110116160812.000|CC1|BUT ALONG THE WAY GREG FOUND

20110116162807.000|20110116162807.000|CC1|   IF YOUR BREATHING SUDDENLY

20110116162810.000|20110116162810.000|CC1|   YOU GET HIVES, HAVE VISION   
20110116162810.000|20110116162812.000|CC1|      CHANGES OR EYE PAIN,      
20110116162812.000|20110116162812.000|CC1|        OR HAVE PROBLEMS        
20110116162812.000|20110116162813.000|CC1|         PASSING URINE.

20110116162816.000|20110116162816.000|CC1|      AS THESE MAY WORSEN       
20110116162816.000|20110116162818.000|CC1|         WITH SPIRIVA.
